about.details:
Incorporated in 1996, Travels & Rentals Limited provides a wide range of travel-related products and services for complete travel solutions. The company offers airline tickets, hotels, tour packages, rail tickets, as well as additional services like travel insurance, passport & visa processing, and tickets for activities and attractions.

The products/services of the company include the following:

  1. Air ticketing - domestic and international flights
  2. Packaged Tours - inbound and outbound customised tours
  3. Hotel Reservation - worldwide hotel reservation and packages.
  4. Visa, Passport, Insurance and other related specialized services.

The company has a strong network with travel agents across Europe, the USA, South and Southeast Asia, the Middle East, Africa, and Australia.

The company is accredited by the International Air Transport Association (IATA) in Geneva, Switzerland. It is also recognized by the Ministry of Tourism, Government of India and is a member of both the Travel Agent Association of India (TAAI) and the Indian Association of Tour Operators (IATO).

As of March 31, 2024 the company has 58 employees.

faqs.question: What is the Travels & Rentals IPO?
faqs.answer:
Travels & Rentals IPO is a SME IPO of 3060000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹12.24 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹40 per share. The minimum order quantity is 3000.

The IPO opens on August 29, 2024, and closes on September 2, 2024.

Cameo Corporate Services Limited is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Travels & Rentals IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Travels & Rentals IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Travels & Rentals IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Travels & Rentals IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Travels & Rentals IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Travels & Rentals IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Travels & Rentals IPO opens on August 29, 2024 and closes on September 2, 2024.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Travels & Rentals IPO?
faqs.answer: Travels & Rentals IPO lot size is 3000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,20,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Travels & Rentals IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Travels & Rentals IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Travels & Rentals IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Travels & Rentals IPO will be done on Tuesday, September 3, 2024, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Wednesday, September 4, 2024. Check the Travels & Rentals IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Travels & Rentals IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Travels & Rentals IPO listing date is on Thursday, September 5, 2024.
